thread.title: Salman recreates Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam moments with Sonam
thread.title_full: Salman recreates Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam moments with Sonam

author: Oct 13
title: Salman recreates Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam moments with Sonam
text:
Salman recreates Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam moments with Sonam Oct 13, 2015, Agencies: Salman Khan has become the talk of the town thesedays as his latest movie ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ is going to hit the screens soon.

A recent poster of 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ shows similarities with Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam, a movie which still remains the epitome of romance in Bollywood.

In the poster, we can see Salman in an ethnic wear pulling Sonam’s long plaits to draw her close. The lovely song ‘Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam’ also has a similar scene where Salman Khan draws Aishwarya close to him by pulling her plaits.

What reflected in the eyes of Salman and Aishwarya at that time was true sublime love. But the question here is, will the same magic be recreated with Sonam. 

Prem Ratan Dhan Payo is written and directed by Sooraj Barjatya. The film is scheduled to release on November 12 this year.
